alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 7:34PM CST until February 07 at 7:07PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 26.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Saturday was 26.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 28.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning to 16.8 feet and begin rising again Wednesday morning. It will rise to 16.9 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
